i drive a honda car.

content.text: How are you doing today?
Good! Just got home from work. How are you doing?
Pretty good. I am single and I need my space.
Oh, that is okay. I am single and I like my space too.
I like making my own Christmas cards. Do you have any hobbies?
I like to go scuba diving. I went scuba diving in the Great Barrier Reef, which was an amazing experience.
That sounds really cool. I have always wanted to go scuba diving.
It is really fun. You should try it sometime.
I will. I am known for my moves on the dance floor.
That is cool. I like to dance too.
I like to listen to music. My favorite song is Barbie Girl.
Barbie Girl? That is an interesting song. I like to listen to a lot of different music.
What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music. I like to listen to country music, pop music, rock music, etc.
I like country music too. I like to go to country concerts.
That is cool. I like to go to concerts too.
What are some of your favorite concerts that you have been to?
I have been to a lot of good concerts. I really liked going to the Kenny Chesney concert.
That is a good concert. I have been to a few of his concerts.
He is a great artist.
I agree. He is one of my favorites.
